name: smirky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with a smile that expresses satisfaction or pleasure about doing something, or about knowing something that is not known by someone else: At times he seems smirky, stubborn, and arrogant.smirky grin She had a little smirky grin and I could see she was very pleased with what she'd done.
More examplesFewer examplesThe show was full of smirky jokes and unbelievable situations.A lot of people will remember that kind of smirky look that he had.The first thing I noticed was that she finally didn't have that smirky smile on her face anymore.He was the smirkiest performer in the history of the movies.
